channel.title: Mage Training Minigames
channel.description:
With 55 magic what are my best moneymaking options there, please explain thourghly as I have never played the game.
(I plan on using the RiD bot but I need to know the best way to use the bot)

item.title: Mage Training Minigames
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Kaza, post:5, topic:348636”]Is this mini-game safe?

as I came back to the bot with 9hp from the graveyard mini-game, didn’t realise you need food?[/quote]
make sure you dont have bones to peaches or both b2p and bones to bananas checked.

Just bones to bananas.

Read full topic

item.title: Mage Training Minigames
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

You need to invest in Bones to Peaches really, no bots work good with Bones to Bananas - Not sure why, they just suck.

Read full topic

item.title: Mage Training Minigames
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

mwiebelhaus:

You don’t need food, you get food from bananas, the game is safe except you lose 10 graveyard points each time you die. I do mage books and I do 2 at a time so its 10 mill each trip plus I spend like 3 mill on runes so abotu 7 mill profit each time and about 20 hours.

The bot wasn’t eating the fruit though. Or It would of carried on and I wouldn’t of come back to low HP

Read full topic

item.title: Mage Training Minigames
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

eczema3:

The telekinetic mazes are really really easy, and theres really only about 5 or 6 different mazes, once you’ve done them once, you can do them hundreds of times flawlessly.

Yeah and they offer little to no experience. If you arent botting and doing all the things its not worth the time. If you want experince and your not botting do enchantment/alchmeist. Those offer the most experince upwards of 600k per day.

Read full topic

I do 10 pairs of boots at a time, and just get the longest number done first.

item.title: Mage Training Minigames
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:1, topic:348636”]With 55 magic what are my best moneymaking options there, please explain thourghly as I have never played the game.

(I plan on using the RiD bot but I need to know the best way to use the bot)[/quote]

Nothing complicated about it - The best profit for you is to do Infinity Boots which in my case I find the best way to do it is by doing Alchemy first, followed by Enchanting and Graveyard and finally Telekenetic.

Alchemists Playground is basically enchanting items you get from a cupboard with price changes.
Enchanting is just enchanting different items that are displayed on screen.
Graveyard is using Bones to Peaches or Bananas on bones you pick up and then deposit.
Telekenetic is using Telekenetic grab on an item in a maze to get points.

Rly is simple, do it in the order I say and do enough for 2-3 boots at a time and money and xp rolls in

Read full topic
